    Utility class for detecting collisions between bricks and the board.

    Interface for brick drop inputs.

    Event source: USER (keyboard) or THREAD (auto-drop).

    Input event types for game control.

    Command pattern interface for game actions.

    Interface for handling game input actions.

    InputHandler

    Callback for input results.

    Main
    Main JavaFX application entry point.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class for matrix operations (copy, merge, clear rows).
    MenuAnimationController
     
    MenuController
     
    MoveEvent
    Immutable event representing a game input action.
    MovementInput
    Interface for brick movement inputs (left, right, rotate).
    MusicManager
    Singleton manager for music playback, volume control, and sound effects.
    MusicManager.Track
    Available music tracks.

    Holds rotation matrix and index for rotation operations.
    RowClearMessage
     
    RowClearResult
    Result of row clearing with updated matrix and stats.
    Score
    Value object for game score with JavaFX binding support.
    ScoreManager
    Facade for managing game score.
    ScoringPolicy
    Strategy interface for calculating game scores.
    SettingsPanelManager
     
    ShowResult
    Composite result pairing RowClearResult with ViewData.
    SimpleBoard
    Core board implementation managing brick placement and movement.
    SimpleBoardFactory
     
    SimpleBoardPorts
     
    SpawnManager
    Manages brick spawning and game over notification using Observer pattern.
    SpawnManager.GameOverCallback
    Callback interface for game over notifications.
    SpawnResult
    Result indicating if spawn caused game over.

    TimedGameController
     
    TitleSetupManager
     
    ViewData
